      • isReact

        public boolean isReact(Reaction reaction,
                       User user)
                throws PiikDatabaseException
        Function that determines if a user has reacted to a concrete post with a concrete reaction
        Parameters:
        reaction - reaction to check
        user - user who wants to check if he reacted
        Returns:
        TRUE if the user has reacted to a post with a specific reaction, FALSE in the other case
        Throws:
        PiikDatabaseException
